channel.title: [317] Only use command once a day?
channel.description: Hey, i was wondering how to make a command that only allows the user to use it once a day. I would like for it to be ::money and it would give them 10m, but they can only use it once a day. Please help =(

item.title: [317] Only use command once a day?
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Do you think you can give me an example? and how to install it…
I’m really bad about commands =P but I have gotten alot better I think =P

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Only use command once a day?
